content: I'm sorry but I'm really new to lean. I don't know if there is any good tool to verify the lean code automatically as easily as possible
Might be relevant: #lean4 > A better Lean checker
I use LeanClient for a lot of my stuff at the moment (thanks @Oliver Dressler, has been super useful!).
It allows the machines to interact with Lean the same way we do.
I will read this article and really really thank you!
